topic.title: DITA-OT Plugins
topic.abstract: Documentation for a series of plug-in for DITA Open Toolkit that extends the default processing with additional functionality

body.p: Each DITA-OT Plug-in has been tested against DITA-OT 3.x. It is recommended that you upgrade to the latest version. Detailed instructions for installing each plug-in can be found in the relevant section of the documentation.

section.title: Installing DITA-OT
section.p: DITA Open Toolkit, or DITA-OT for short, is a set of Java-based, open-source tools that provide processing for content authored in the Darwin Information Typing Architecture.Full installation instructions for downloading DITA-OT can be found here.

ol.li: Download the dita-ot-3.6.1.zip package from the project website at dita-ot.org/download
Extract the contents of the package to the directory where you want to install DITA-OT.
Optional: Add the absolute path for the bin directory to the PATH system variable.

section.p: This defines the necessary environment variable to run the dita command from the command line.
